execution_plan.description: Compute the minimum price among all goods with food = 'Croissant'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT MIN(price) AS min_price FROM goods WHERE food = 'Croissant' AND price IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Get ids of goods with food = 'Cookies' whose price is lower than the minimum Croissant price found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE food = 'Cookies' AND price IS NOT NULL AND price < $step1.min_price;
